# chirpstack_tenant (Resource)

Tenant resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "chirpstack_tenant" "tenant" {
  name        = "mytenant"
  description = "My Tenant"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Tenant name

### Optional

- `description` (String) Tenant description

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Tenant identifier
